title: The Spirited Pizza Toss
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), ultra detailed, sharp focus, 2D Anime style, manga illustration, full-body vertical portrait (9:16), vibrant colors. An energetic young male pizzaiolo (chef) wearing a white chef uniform and red checkered bandana, standing confidently in front of a traditional brick wood-fired oven. He is skillfully tossing a perfectly stretched pizza dough high into the air. Detailed wooden table in the foreground with bowls of fresh ingredients: tomato sauce, shredded cheese, sliced pepperoni, basil leaves, and ripe tomatoes. Warm interior lighting, expressive lineart, thick outlines.
